name: Blob...Just Blob
description:
You are Blob.

 Eat different objects in your environment to explore the world as Blob!

Made in 48 hours for LCAD's Game Jam

Programing: Brendon Mye

Animations: Moth Sitzman

Level Design: K Sosnovsky

Environment Art: K Sosnovsky, Insoo Yoon

Prop Art: Insoo Yoon

Additional Art: Moth Sitzman
